shiny.likert 0.0.2
  • Get started
  • Reference

💛 shiny.likert

Shiny application for generate likert chart.

🔧 Install and Run application 

remotes::install_github('zarathucorp/shiny.likert')
library(shiny.likert)

shiny.likert()

📋 Prerequisites

  • bslib - 0.4.2
  • colourpicker- 1.2.0
  • dplyr- 1.1.0
  • ggplot2 - 3.4.1
  • likert- 2.0.0
  • plotly- 4.10.1
  • shiny - 1.7.4
  • shinyWidgets- 0.7.6
  • sortable- 0.4.6

😊 Authors

  • :octocat: Jinhwan Kim @jhk0530
